content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ElectricVehicle_Ext_table_2(
    [VIN (1-10)] VARCHAR(100),
    County VARCHAR(100),
    City VARCHAR(100),
    State VARCHAR(50),
    [Postal Code] VARCHAR(20),
    [Model Year] INT,
    Make VARCHAR(100),
    Model VARCHAR(100),
    [Electric Vehicle Type] VARCHAR(100),
    [Clean Alternative Fuel Vehicle (CAFV) Eligibility] VARCHAR(100),
    [Electric Range] INT,
    [Base MSRP] INT,
    [Legislative District] VARCHAR(50),
    [DOL Vehicle ID] VARCHAR(100),
    [Vehicle Location] VARCHAR(200),
    [Electric Utility] VARCHAR(200),
    [2020 Census Tract] VARCHAR(100)
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/Electric_Vehicle_Population_Data_1.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = Raw_Ext_Source,
    FILE_FORMAT = CSV_Format
);

--Union

CREATE VIEW vw_ElectricVehi_Ext_union
AS
SELECT * FROM dbo.ElectricVehicle_Ext_table
UNION
SELECT * FROM dbo.ElectricVehicle_Ext_table_2;
GO

Select * FROM dbo.vw_ElectricVehi_Ext_union;

-----------------------------------------------------------

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.GreenHouseEmission_Ext_table
(
    [2017 NAICS Code] NVARCHAR(50),
    [2017 NAICS Title] NVARCHAR(200),
    [GHG] FLOAT,
    [Unit] NVARCHAR(50),
    [Supply Chain Emission Factors without Margins] FLOAT,
    [Margins of Supply Chain Emission Factors] FLOAT,
    [Supply Chain Emission Factors with Margins] FLOAT,
    [Reference USEEIO Code] NVARCHAR(100)
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/GreenHouseEmssion.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = Raw_Ext_Source,
    FILE_FORMAT = CSV_Format
);

select * FROM dbo.GreenHouseEmission_Ext_table;

--Croos Join, since no common column exist

CREATE VIEW dbo.vw_ElectricVehicle_GreenHouse_CrosJn
AS
SELECT 
    ele.*,
    ghe.*
FROM dbo.ElectricVehicle_Ext_table ele
CROSS JOIN dbo.GreenHouseEmission_Ext_table ghe;
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.vw_ElectricVehicle_GreenHouse_CrosJn;


--Tesla result

CREATE VIEW vw_Tesla_car
AS
SELECT * FROM dbo.ElectricVehicle_Ext_table
WHERE Make = 'TESLA';

SELECT * FROM vw_Tesla_car;
